name: Tiles (itch) (ionre)
description:
Based on xkcd.com/245. 

  • Click on a tile to jump to it (you can jump a maximum of 2 tiles away in a straight line or one diagonally).
  • Only step on black tiles or tiles directly inline with the black tiles. 
  • Don't touch the walls.
  • Press 'p' or 'escape' to pause.
  • That's it!
